MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_SMECNS_V2
MODULE.description:
Single-mic ECNS version 2 in the voice processor on the Tx#[ #] path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs#[ #] 
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_EC_DELAY
VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_EC
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_NS
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_#[ #]V2_NS_STATE
VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_EC_STATE
VOICE_PARAM_MUTE_DET
VOICE_PARAM_MUTE_DET_STATE
VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_FLEC
VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_FLEC_STATE#[ #] 
RTM_LOGGING_PARAM_ENABLE 
RTM_PCM_LOGGING_PARAM

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_EC_DELAY
PARAMETER.description:
Fixed echo path delay in the firmware. The delay is in#[ #] multiples of 8 kHz samples.
Maximum array size for this parameter
Version 0 â€“ 4 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Echo_Path_Delay
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Compensates#[ #] the fixed delay in echo path

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] path to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
PARAMETER.description:
Returns the Adaptive Filter (AF) coefficients of the currently#[ #] configured echo canceler. This parameter is read only.

AecPathStruct variable length payload
The total number of taps over all filters for both#[ #] Fg and Bg arrays must not exceed 2000. Fg and Bg filters for a particular filter index i use the same length AFLen[i]. Therefore, the sum of#[ #] AFLen[i] over i from 0 to (NumAfFilter-1) must not exceed (2000 / 2) = 1000. The maximum size is 4024 bytes.
BASE represents the byte offset of the#[ #] current AecPath i, which has filter length AFLen[i]. The next AecPathStruct for index (i+1) starts at offset BASE+4+4*AFLen[i].

Maximum size of#[ #] VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS
The memory allocated to get the AF coefficients must be large enough to accommodate the maximum size of the#[ #] VOICE_PARAM_AF_COEFFS structure. The maximum size depends on the maximum number of AF taps allowed for the current topology configuration.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Voice_processing_topology
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description:
Topology ID that defines the mode of echo cancellation.
 Supported topology IDs : 
-#[ #] VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_SM_ECNS_V2 Single-mic ECNS v2
- VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_QM_FLUENCE_PRO Quad-mic Fluence Pro
-#[ #] VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_QM_FLUENCE_PROV2 Quad-mic Fluence Pro v2
- VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_SM_FLUENCEV5 Single-mic Fluence v5
-#[ #] VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_DM_FLUENCEV5 Dual-mic Fluence v5
- VSS_IVOCPROC_TOPOLOGY_ID_TX_DM_FLUENCEV_BROADSIDE

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: NumAecPaths
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of AEC paths (0 to 5).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AecPathData
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: AecPathStruct#[ #] variable length payload.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: AFLen
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of AEC paths (0 to 5).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wgtQ
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q#[ #] factor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wgtFg
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: AFLen#[ #] taps for the wgtFg filter for a specific AecPath.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wgtBg
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: AFLen#[ #] taps for the wgtBg filter for a specific AecPath.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_EC
PARAMETER.description:
Single-mic ECNS version 2 for echo cancellation.
Maximum array size#[ #] for this parameter
Version 0 -- 156 bytes Version 1 extension -- 160 bytes Version 2 extension -- 168 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_NS
PARAMETER.description:
Single-mic ECNS version 2 for noise suppression.
Maximum array size#[ #] for this parameter
Version 0 -- 96 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_NS_STATE
PARAMETER.description:
Provides internal status monitoring of single-mic ECNS version#[ #] 2.
Maximum array size for this read-only parameter 
Version 0 â€“ 32 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set#[ #] this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_SMECNS_V2_EC_STATE
PARAMETER.description:
Provides internal status monitoring of an echo cancellation#[ #] block of the single-mic ECNS version 2 parameter.
Maximum array size for this read-only parameter 

Version 0 â€“ 700 bytes Version 1 extension#[ #] â€“ 708 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set#[ #] this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set#[ #] this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved3
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set#[ #] this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_MUTE_DET
PARAMETER.description:
Tunes mute detection. Fluence V5 and Fluence Pro modules support this#[ #] parameter.
Maximum array size for this parameter 
Version 0 - 24 bytes

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_MUTE_DET_STATE
PARAMETER.description:
Monitors the mute detection state. Fluence V5 and Fluence Pro#[ #] modules support this read-only parameter. 
Maximum array size for this parameter 
Version 0 â€“ 12+num_mic*4 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set#[ #] this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mic
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Dynamic array depending on the size#[ #] of mic.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_FLEC
PARAMETER.description: Multi-mic frequency domain echo canceler. Maximum array size for#[ #] this parameter\nVersion 0 -- 68 bytes\n

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set this#[ #] field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_FLUENCE_FLEC_STATE
PARAMETER.description:
Multi mic frequency domain echo canceler monitor.
Maximum#[ #] array size for this parameter 
Version 0 - 56 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client must set#[ #] this field to zero.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: flec_allow_adapt_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: flec_allow_adapt_flag [4]

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: flec_dtd_stats_Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: flec_dtd_stats_Q15 [4]

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: flec_adapt_flag_ratio_Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: flec_adapt_flag_ratio_Q15 [4]

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable_rtm_logging
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Param to enable RTM logging for any Audio module

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: unique_id
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Param to query unique identifier of the module accross the sessions

PARAMETER.name: RTM_PCM_LOGGING_PARAM
PARAMETER.description:
To query RTM PCM logging.
Payload size of this parameter is dynamic#[ #] and depends on pcm_size. The header size for this param is
Version 0 - 48 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pcm_size
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: total size of PCM data in Bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: log_tap_id
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: tap ID for PCM data

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sampling_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: sampling rate of the PCM data

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_channels
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of channels in the PCM stream getting logged

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pcm_width
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: pcm width of the PCM data

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: interleaved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: specifies whether PCM data packing is interleaved or deinterleaved

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: channel_map
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Channel map of each channel in the PCM stream getting logged

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: payload
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Array#[ #] of PCM data
